gobblin.runtime

Class TaskStateCollectorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
      • gobblin.runtime.TaskStateCollectorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public class TaskStateCollectorService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
    An AbstractScheduledService for collecting output TaskStates of completed Tasks stored in files, which get deleted once the TaskStates they store are successfully collected. For each batch of TaskStates collected, it posts a NewTaskCompletionEvent to notify parties that are interested in such events.
